file.name: swos-109-subtree-resolver.yaml
file.content:
meta:
  title: "SWOS-109: subtree resolver cases"
cases:
- name: cross-document $ref
  remoteDocuments:
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                type: string
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
      path: []
      opts:
        returnEntireTree: true
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      type: string
- name: cross-document $ref to a remote document within allOf
  remoteDocuments:
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                type: string
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              allOf:
              - $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
      path: []
      opts:
        returnEntireTree: true
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      type: string
- name: cross-document $ref to a remote document within allOf with a circular reference
  remoteDocuments:
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Action'
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              allOf:
                - $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
      path: []
      opts:
        returnEntireTree: true
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $ref: 'http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action'
- name: cross-document $refs within nested members of multi-member allOf
  remoteDocuments:
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          BThing:
            properties:
              bContent:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BPrivateThing'
          BPrivateThing:
            type: string
    c.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          CThing:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CPrivateThing'
          CPrivateThing:
            type: string
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MyThing:
              allOf:
                - $ref: "#/components/schemas/AThing"
                - $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/BThing"
                - properties:
                    cContent:
                      $ref: "./c.yaml#/components/schemas/CThing"
            AThing:
              type: object
              properties:
                aContent:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
            APrivateThing:
              type: string
      path: [components, schemas, MyThing]
      opts:
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        type: object
        properties:
          aContent: 
            $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
            type: string
          bContent: 
            $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/BPrivateThing"
            type: string
          cContent: 
            $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/c.yaml#/components/schemas/CPrivateThing"
            type: string
- name: nested cross-document $refs within multi-member allOf
  remoteDocuments:
    documents/b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          BThing:
            properties:
              bContent:
                allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BPrivateThing'
          BPrivateThing:
            $ref: "../partials/d.yaml"
    documents/c.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          CThing:
            properties:
              cContent:
                allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/CPrivateThing'
          CPrivateThing:
            $ref: "../partials/e.yaml"
    partials/d.yaml: 
      type: string
    partials/e.yaml:
      type: object
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MyThing:
              allOf:
                - $ref: "#/components/schemas/AThing"
                - $ref: "./documents/b.yaml#/components/schemas/BThing"
                - $ref: "./documents/c.yaml#/components/schemas/CThing"
            AThing:
              type: object
              properties:
                aContent:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
            APrivateThing:
              type: string
      path: [components, schemas, MyThing]
      opts:
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        type: object
        properties:
          aContent: 
            $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
            type: string
          bContent: 
            type: string
          cContent: 
            type: object
